search_query: Procore Technologies competitors 2025 construction management software
context: Procore is a leading construction management software platform used by large construction teams. In 2025, companies seek alternatives due to high and increasing subscription costs that cut into profit margins, making it unaffordable especially for smaller construction companies. The market includes enterprise solutions, owner-focused platforms, specialty contractor tools, and residential construction software.

competitors.name: Autodesk Construction Cloud
competitors.notes: Best overall Procore alternative. Connects workflows, teams and data at every stage. Built on unified platform and common data environment. Empowers GCs, specialty trades, designers and owners to drive better outcomes.

competitors.name: Mastt
competitors.notes: Top competitor for project owners delivering capital projects. Purpose-built for owners and PMs. Simplifies cost tracking, risk visibility, and portfolio oversight.

competitors.name: Oracle Primavera
competitors.notes: Most powerful, robust enterprise project portfolio management solution for globally prioritizing, planning, managing, and executing projects, programs, and portfolios.

competitors.name: e-Builder
competitors.notes: Cloud-based construction management for capital projects. Provides insights throughout project lifecycle, reduces risk and improves performance. Strong for project owners.

competitors.name: Fieldwire by Hilti
competitors.notes: Mobile-first construction management powering over 2 million job sites. Connects foremen, PMs, field crews in real-time with offline access and intuitive task management.

competitors.name: ServiceTitan
competitors.notes: Specializes in supporting specialty contractors: Mechanical/HVAC, plumbing, electrical, roofing. All workflows tailored for subcontractors working with general contractors.

competitors.name: Buildertrend
competitors.notes: Designed for residential construction managing multiple moving parts: bids, estimates, scheduling, homeowner updates. Tailored for home builders, remodelers, specialty contractors.

competitors.name: ClickUp
competitors.notes: Flexible all-in-one productivity platform for construction project management. Customizable workflows and logical hierarchy for complex teams.

competitors.name: HCSS
competitors.notes: Construction software suite competing with Procore.

competitors.name: Bluebeam
competitors.notes: PDF-based construction collaboration and markup software.

competitors.name: Viewpoint Spectrum
competitors.notes: Construction management for accounting, payroll, HR tasks to streamline operations.

competitors.name: Sage Construction Management
competitors.notes: Online suite for estimating, project management, job cost control, scheduling, collaboration.

competitors.name: Contractor Foreman
competitors.notes: Online construction management software used by contractors in 75+ countries.
